text:
Songstress Taylor Swift Hires Second Gay Porn Star for a Music Video: Details





Updated: About 2 days ago

You may not recognize this Kevin Falk with all of his clothing on, but in fact, the famous porn star was featured in a recent music video.

According to Billboard, the Randy Blue actor was hired to play one of Taylor Swift's bodyguards in her latest music video for "Delicate."

If you don't remember Kevin, he is best known for his work on the aforementioned gay porn site, acting under aliases like Danny Hart, Jim Jupiter, Memphis Blake, and Jim Jojo.

Songstress Taylor Swift Hires Second Gay Porn Star for a Music Video: Details

Source: rttnews

This is not the 28-year-old singer's first time dipping into the porn pool for her music video extras. But in 2012's video for her smash hit We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together, Mark de Marko was featured as a the party-goer who had glitter thrown on them.

Taylor is known for making bold statements, and she didn't disappoint this time (whether it was intentional or not.) To hire porn stars for music videos is definitely not a novel concept.

Taylor is not only a singer who hires adult actors for the music video. In 2011, music artist Eminem also released a music video for his song Space Bound which featured Sasha Grey, a porn star turned movie actress.

Additionally, singer Miley Cyrus was seen in a Borgore music video with an adult film star Jessie Andrews.
title: Songstress Taylor Swift Hires Second Gay Porn Star for a Music Video: Details
